code: import{ActionTypes}from'../contants/action-type';export var setProducts=function setProducts(product){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_PRODUCTS,payload:product};};export var selectedProduct=function selectedProduct(product){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:product};};export var setProductDiscount=function setProductDiscount(discount){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_DISCOUNT,payload:discount};};export var setProductLimited=function setProductLimited(limit){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_LIMITED,payload:limit};};export var setProductSelling=function setProductSelling(selling){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_SELLING,payload:selling};};export var setProductBestSelling=function setProductBestSelling(bestselling){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_BEST_SELLING,payload:bestselling};};export var setRelatedProduct=function setRelatedProduct(ralated){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_RELATED_PRODUCT,payload:ralated};};export var setComment=function setComment(comemmnt){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_COMMENT,payload:comemmnt};};export var setUserAccount=function setUserAccount(user){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECT_USER,payload:user};};
